anathema: Break your word, be cruel to the innocent, rebuke someone due to their homeland
edict: Finish any and all tasks you accept, bring those who are cruel to justice, show pride in your home and your heritage
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Chohar (The Golden Lion)](/Deities.aspx?ID=675)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=237) pg. 17

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Mwangi Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=20)

**Edicts** Finish any and all tasks you accept, bring those who are cruel to justice, show pride in your home and your heritage

**Anathema** Break your word, be cruel to the innocent, rebuke someone due to their homeland

**Area of Concern**
Justice, loyalty, work

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40)

**Favored Weapon** [Starknife](/Weapons.aspx?ID=399)

**Domains** [Cities](/Domains.aspx?ID=66), [Family](/Domains.aspx?ID=74), [Fire](/Domains.aspx?ID=76), [Sun](/Domains.aspx?ID=92)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Duty](/Domains.aspx?ID=108), [Toil](/Domains.aspx?ID=122), [Vigil](/Domains.aspx?ID=123), [Zeal](/Domains.aspx?ID=100)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Breathe Fire](/Spells.aspx?ID=1457)

- **3rd**
[Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=1530)

- **4th**
[Fire Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=1529)

</column>
name: Chohar (The Golden Lion)
